reviewText:
Outstanding production overall, photography, sound narration.
It makes Vatican seem so divine and beautiful and the legacy of the history
is well presented.  I will recommend this to people.

In The Footsteps of Peter is probably one of the most elegant video collections I've ever viewed.  Whether or not you're Catholic, this magnificent collection of tapes produced by the Vatican Museums provides an exhaustive and very informative history of Western Civilization -- beautifully filmed and very intelligently narrated.
